<font color="#CCCCCC">happiness is to delight yourself in</font>

does it light yourself in Yahshua an

unrolled my windows I was driving<font color="#CCCCCC"> down</font>

most cool ocean breeze was blowing

yourself and yacht it affects all your

it affects every part of your life and
